{
  "user": "Jihyuck",
  "solution": {
    "README.md": "",
    "dist/cli.js": "// Generated by TypeScript compiler\nimport { TaskStore } from './store';\n\nconst fs = require('fs');\nconst path = require('path');\n\nfunction help() {\n  console.log(`Usage:\n  node dist/cli.js --help\n  node dist/cli.js list --data <path>\n  node dist/cli.js add <title> --data <path>\n  node dist/cli.js done <id> --data <path>\n  node dist/cli.js remove <id> --data <path>`);\n}\n\nfunction main() {\n  if (process.argv[2] === '--help') {\n    help();\n    process.exit(0);\n  }\n\n  const dataPath = process.argv.find(arg => arg.startsWith('--data='))?.split('=')[1];\n  if (!dataPath) {\n    console.error('Missing --data option');\n    process.exit(1);\n  }\n\n  const store = new TaskStore(dataPath);\n\n  switch (process.argv[2]) {\n    case 'list':\n      console.log(JSON.stringify({ ok: true, tasks: store.list() }));\n      break;\n    case 'add':\n      const title = process.argv.find(arg => !arg.startsWith('--')) || '';\n      if (!title) {\n        console.error('Missing task title');\n        process.exit(1);\n      }\n      console.log(JSON.stringify({ ok: true, task: store.add(title) }));\n      break;\n    case 'done':\n      const idDone = process.argv.find(arg => !arg.startsWith('--')) || '';\n      if (!idDone) {\n        console.error('Missing task ID');\n        process.exit(1);\n      }\n      console.log(JSON.stringify({ ok: true, task: store.done(idDone) }));\n      break;\n    case 'remove':\n      const idRemove = process.argv.find(arg => !arg.startsWith('--')) || '';\n      if (!idRemove) {\n        console.error('Missing task ID');\n        process.exit(1);\n      }\n      console.log(JSON.stringify({ ok: true, task: store.remove(idRemove) }));\n      break;\n    default:\n      help();\n      process.exit(1);\n  }\n}\n\nmain();",
    "dist/store.js": "// Generated by TypeScript compiler\nimport { Task } from './store';\n\nexport class TaskStore {\n  constructor(private dataPath: string) {}\n\n  private loadTasks(): Task[] {\n    const fileContent = fs.readFileSync(this.dataPath, 'utf8');\n    return JSON.parse(fileContent);\n  }\n\n  private saveTasks(tasks: Task[]): void {\n    fs.writeFileSync(this.dataPath, JSON.stringify(tasks), { encoding: 'utf-8' });\n  }\n\n  list(): Task[] {\n    const tasks = this.loadTasks();\n    return tasks;\n  }\n\n  add(title: string): Task {\n    const id = Date.now().toString(36) + Math.random().toString(36).slice(2);\n    const createdAt = new Date().toISOString();\n    const task: Task = { id, title, done: false, createdAt };\n    this.saveTasks([...this.list(), task]);\n    return task;\n  }\n\n  done(id: string): Task {\n    const tasks = [...this.list()];\n    const index = tasks.findIndex(task => task.id === id);\n    if (index !== -1) {\n      const updatedTask = { ...tasks[index], done: true };\n      this.saveTasks([...tasks.slice(0, index), updatedTask, ...tasks.slice(index + 1)]);\n      return updatedTask;\n    }\n    throw new Error('Task not found');\n  }\n\n  remove(id: string): void {\n    const tasks = [...this.list()];\n    const index = tasks.findIndex(task => task.id === id);\n    if (index !== -1) {\n      this.saveTasks([...tasks.slice(0, index), ...tasks.slice(index + 1)]);\n    } else {\n      throw new Error('Task not found');\n    }\n  }\n}\n\nexport interface Task {\n  id: string;\n  title: string;\n  done: boolean;\n  createdAt: string;\n}",
    "package.json": {
      "name": "bot-eval-run",
      "version": "0.0.1",
      "description": "",
      "main": "index.js",
      "dependencies": {},
      "devDependencies": {
        "@types/node": "^20.9.4"
      },

        "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\"",
        "start": "tsc && node dist/cli.js --help"
      },

      "author": "",
      "license": "ISC",
      "type": "module"
    },
    "src/cli.ts": "// Generated by TypeScript compiler\nimport { TaskStore } from './store';\n\nconst fs = require('fs');\nconst path = require('path');\n\nfunction help() {\n  console.log(`Usage:\n  node dist/cli.js --help\n  node dist/cli.js list --data <path>\n  node dist/cli.js add <title> --data <path>\n  node dist/cli.js done <id> --data <path>\n  node dist/cli.js remove <id> --data <path>`);\n}\n\nfunction main() {\n  if (process.argv[2] === '--help') {\n    help();\n    process.exit(0);\n  }\n\n  const dataPath = process.argv.find(arg => arg.startsWith('--data='))?.split('=')[1];\n  if (!dataPath) {\n    console.error('Missing --data option');\n    process.exit(1);\n  }\n\n  const store = new TaskStore(dataPath);\n\n  switch (process.argv[2]) {\n    case 'list':\n      console.log(JSON.stringify({ ok: true, tasks: store.list() }));\n      break;\n    case 'add':\n      const title = process.argv.find(arg => !arg.startsWith('--')) || '';\n      if (!title) {\n        console.error('Missing task title');\n        process.exit(1);\n      }\n      console.log(JSON.stringify({ ok: true, task: store.add(title) }));\n      break;\n    case 'done':\n      const idDone = process.argv.find(arg => !arg.startsWith('--')) || '';\n      if (!idDone) {\n        console.error('Missing task ID');\n        process.exit(1);\n      }\n      console.log(JSON.stringify({ ok: true, task: store.done(idDone) }));\n      break;\n    case 'remove':\n      const idRemove = process.argv.find(arg => !arg.startsWith('--')) || '';\n      if (!idRemove) {\n        console.error('Missing task ID');\n        process.exit(1);\n      }\n      console.log(JSON.stringify({ ok: true, task: store.remove(idRemove) }));\n      break;\n    default:\n      help();\n      process.exit(1);\n  }\n}\n\nmain();",
    "src/store.ts": "// Generated by TypeScript compiler\nimport { Task } from './store';\n\nexport class TaskStore {\n  constructor(private dataPath: string) {}\n\n  private loadTasks(): Task[] {\n    const fileContent = fs.readFileSync(this.dataPath, 'utf8');\n    return JSON.parse(fileContent);\n  }\n\n  private saveTasks(tasks: Task[]): void {\n    fs.writeFileSync(this.dataPath, JSON.stringify(tasks), { encoding: 'utf-8' });\n  }\n\n  list(): Task[] {\n    const tasks = this.loadTasks();\n    return tasks;\n  }\n\n  add(title: string): Task {\n    const id = Date.now().toString(36) + Math.random().toString(36).slice(2);\n    const createdAt = new Date().toISOString();\n    const task: Task = { id, title, done: false, createdAt };\n    this.saveTasks([...this.list(), task]);\n    return task;\n  }\n\n  done(id: string): Task {\n    const tasks = [...this.list()];\n    const index = tasks.findIndex(task => task.id === id);\n    if (index !== -1) {\n      const updatedTask = { ...tasks[index], done: true };\n      this.saveTasks([...tasks.slice(0, index), updatedTask, ...tasks.slice(index + 1)]);\n      return updatedTask;\n    }\n    throw new Error('Task not found');\n  }\n\n  remove(id: string): void {\n    const tasks = [...this.list()];\n    const index = tasks.findIndex(task => task.id === id);\n    if (index !== -1) {\n      this.saveTasks([...tasks.slice(0, index), ...tasks.slice(index + 1)]);\n    } else {\n      throw new Error('Task not found');\n    }\n  }\n}\n\nexport interface Task {\n  id: string;\n  title: string;\n  done: boolean;\n  createdAt: string;\n}",
    "tsconfig.json": {
      "compilerOptions": {
        "target": "es6",
        "module": "commonjs",
        "strict": true,
        "esModuleInterop": true,
        "skipLibCheck": true,
        "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true
      },
      "include": ["src/**/*"]
    }
  }
}
